datafield.subfield: Condition data for 2011 CMS collision data

![CDATA[
Condition database includes non-event-related information (Alignment, Calibration, Temperature, etc) and parameters for simulation/reconstruction/analysis software.
These files are needed when running a CMSSW job on the Open Data VM. They are automatically read from the /cvmfs/cms-opendata-conddb.cern.ch runtime, you do not need to download these files from here separately.
START53_LVA1 is to be used with the simulated data, and FT_53_LV5_AN1_RUNA is to be used with the collision data of RunA 2011 (with the event range of the open data, the file for the full event range for 2011 are also stored under FT_53_LV5_AN1 on /cvmfs/cms-opendata-conddb.cern.ch)]]
Condition data for 2011 CMS Simulated Datasets

![CDATA[
Condition database includes non-event-related information (Alignment, Calibration, Temperature, etc) and parameters for simulation/reconstruction/analysis software.
These files are needed when running a CMSSW job on the Open Data VM. They are automatically read from the /cvmfs/cms-opendata-conddb.cern.ch runtime, you do not need to download these files from here separately.
START53_LVA1 is to be used with the simulated data, and FT_53_LV5_AN1_RUNA is to be used with the collision data of RunA 2011 (with the event range of the open data, the file for the full event range for 2011 are also stored under FT_53_LV5_AN1 on /cvmfs/cms-opendata-conddb.cern.ch)]]
